wikipedia_page.main: Charlie McDonnell (15 July 1936 – 7 June 2010) was an English professional footballer. He played as inside forward for Stork, Tranmere Rovers, Stockport County, Southport and Glentoran.

response: McDonnell was born and raised in Bath, Somerset to parents Lindsey and Mark. He has two younger siblings: his brother, William, and his sister, Bridie. He was educated at Beechen Cliff School,Charlie McDonnell profile. Thisisbath.co.uk (1 October 2008). Retrieved on 28 December 2011. a local state comprehensive foundation school.
